title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 377: Featuring Darius Kasparaitis + David Pagnotta
description:
On Episode 377 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Darius Kasparaitis and David Pagnotta. Darius joined (01:20:18) to discuss his career, playing in Pittsburgh, his upbringing and tons more. But first, the guys open the show recapping their weekends and discussing all the major NHL news including Jack Eichel’s postgame comments and Auston Matthews suspension. The boys are then joined by David Pagnotta (03:21:18) of The Fourth Period to discuss all things NHL trade deadline. The guys wrap up with RA’s Grinds My Gears and some random stuff.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
